ygData.subject: Re: newbie- im
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, u don t always get a bard to help u. Aye, bards are great to have as a party member. They can heal, give bonuses out but not high as the cleric but
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, u don't always get a bard to help u. Aye, bards are great to have as
a party member. They can heal, give bonuses out but not high as the cleric
but they're fun and great to have around.


At 08:59 PM 4/27/99 +0800, you wrote:
>From: "Wilson" <ritzbits@...>
>
>Hey thats great! Still at level 5 here. Don't powergame too much though, you
>will harm your social life! I used to powergame Meridian 59 for max hps and
>grandmaster in everything. Watched my studies and friends drown. <pardon
>ranting>
>
>For the /loc, I'd warn you its complicated. You will need an instrument to
>measure your whereabouts, just like in UO. <I can't garuntee this is the
>right answer though, all that is in my head now is whats the diff between
>leathery and waxy leafs>
>
>For fast relieve, /ooc and get a Bard to help you retrieve. He can sing/play
>this kinda song that will locate the body for you ;-)
>
>Wilson
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Gary The Q <kanglun@...>
>> Hi,
>> I hit lvl 8 in 4 days of gaming but I'm still lost in the game mecahnics
>> . For example, how do I macro the /loc command to the hotkey bank? How do
>I
>> drag my corpse? How do I make use of the /lco command?
>>
>> Thx for helping!
>
